description: This Dart source file defines the BookingsService class, which provides methods to create bookings by making HTTP requests via Dio. It interacts with an API endpoint, handles responses and errors, and utilizes models and a core API client.

classes.name: BookingsService
classes.description: A service class that handles booking-related operations via HTTP requests.

methods.name: createBooking
methods.description: Creates a new booking by sending a POST request to the API with room ID, check-in, and check-out dates.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Processes DioException errors to extract meaningful error messages.
